channel.title: Comments on: Define Your Lowest Common Denominator

item.title: By: Respecting The User’s Font Settings | Kevin Ragsdale

item.description: [...] an effort to “define the lowest common denominator”, I’ve decided to use Tahoma exclusively in Windows XP, and Segoe UI in Windows Vista and [...]
